backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing timer session recording, custom timer presets, goal management (daily targets with progress tracking), tag management, data export, and wallpaper storage using blob-storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features related to fixing ambient sound audio sources, adding error handling, and ensuring proper Audio element initialization in useAmbientSound.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, and pages, describing the flat white text design system, timer functionality, wallpaper management with video support, and Spotify integration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH-based color system with CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, removing all shadow and transparency utilities for flat design.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Inter and JetBrains Mono font imports from Google Fonts and meta tags for the Study Sanctuary application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing page routing between Timer and Dashboard, integrating ThemeProvider, FocusMode overlay, keyboard shortcuts, and Toaster notifications.
Full-screen focus mode overlay with a simple stopwatch timer, play/pause controls, and exit button, displaying white text with drop shadows over the wallpaper background.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalManage: Dialog component for creating daily study goals with input fields for goal name and target hours, using mutation hooks to save goals to the backend.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalTracke: Displays study goals with progress bars and achievement indicators, showing an empty state with a create button when no goals exist. Renders a list of goals with progress tracking, streak counts, and trophy icons for achieved goals.
frontend/src/components/help/KeyboardSho: Modal dialog component that displays available keyboard shortcuts (F for Focus Mode, ? for shortcuts help). Shows shortcuts in a list with key bindings and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainLayou: Main application layout wrapper providing navigation, wallpaper background, settings sheet, and help dialog. Includes header with app branding, navigation between timer/dashboard pages, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Navigation component with two buttons to switch between Timer and Dashboard pages. Highlights the currently active page with different button variants.
frontend/src/components/presets/PresetMa: Dialog form for creating custom timer presets with fields for name, label, duration (5-120 min slider), and color theme. Saves presets using mutation hook and displays toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/quotes/Motivatio: Displays a random motivational quote with author and field attribution, featuring a refresh button to cycle through quotes. Uses getRandomQuote utility function for quote selection.
frontend/src/components/sound/AmbientSou: Ambient sound player with grid of sound options, play/pause controls, and volume slider. Handles loading states, errors, and browser interaction requirements for audio playback.
frontend/src/components/spotify/SpotifyP: Spotify integration component showing current track with album art, playback controls (play/pause/skip), and login/logout functionality. Displays connection prompt when not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/stats/StudyStats: Displays study statistics with tabs for different time periods (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly), a bar chart for the last 7 days, and filtering by tags. Includes CSV export functionality for session data.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagInput.ts: A reusable tag input component with autocomplete suggestions from existing tags, allowing users to add tags by pressing Enter and remove them with an X button.
frontend/src/components/timers/Animedoro: Implements the Animedoro technique timer with configurable study duration (40-60 min), automatic break calculation, and session saving with tags. Alternates between study and break phases.
frontend/src/components/timers/CustomPre: A timer that uses user-defined presets with custom durations, labels, and colors. Includes preset selection, timer controls, and session saving with tags.
frontend/src/components/timers/PomodoroT: Implements the Pomodoro technique with configurable work and break durations, alternating between work and break phases. Includes settings dialog and session saving with tags.
frontend/src/components/timers/Stopwatch: A simple stopwatch timer that tracks elapsed time with millisecond precision, allowing users to start, pause, reset, and save sessions with tags.
frontend/src/components/timers/TimerSect: Main timer section component that provides a tabbed interface for Stopwatch, Pomodoro, Animedoro, and custom preset timers, with buttons for focus mode and preset management.
frontend/src/components/wallpaper/Wallpa: Renders the full-screen background wallpaper, supporting both video and image types with smooth transitions.
Displays categorized wallpaper thumbnails in a scrollable grid with selection state and includes the wallpaper uploader component.
Provides UI for uploading custom wallpapers either from local files or URLs, with upload progress tracking and toast notifications.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Contains an array of motivational quotes with authors and their fields, focused on education, learning, and personal growth.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the Internet Computer actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientSound.ts: Manages ambient sound playback with volume control, sound selection, and error handling for various audio sources from Google's sound library.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnimedoro.ts: Implements the Animedoro timer technique with alternating study and break phases, session tracking, and tag management.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusMode.ts: Simple hook for toggling focus mode state with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
Implements global keyboard shortcuts (F for focus mode, ? for help) while ignoring events from input fields.
frontend/src/hooks/usePomodoro.ts: Manages Pomodoro timer state with work/break phases, configurable durations, session tracking, and audio notifications on phase completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend operations including sessions, presets, goals, tags, and data import/export functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpotify.ts: Handles Spotify OAuth authentication and playback control (play, pause, next, previous) with token management and current track polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useStopwatch.ts: Implements a stopwatch with start, pause, reset controls and session data export functionality for time tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallpaper.ts: Manages wallpaper selection with predefined anime/study/nature/Ghibli backgrounds and custom uploaded wallpapers, persisting selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a pastel color palette (lavender primary, peach secondary, mint accent) for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page component that displays user progress with a header and renders GoalTracker and StudyStats components in a centered layout.
frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx: Timer page component that displays a motivational quote at the top and arranges TimerSection, AmbientSoundPlayer, and SpotifyPlayer in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/utils/exportData.ts: Utility functions for exporting timer sessions, presets, and goals to CSV or JSON format, including CSV escaping and file download functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH variables, border radius settings, custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a free aesthetic study website with timers (stopwatch, Pomodoro, Animedoro), customizable wallpapers, Spotify integration, study tracking, and architectural notes emphasizing flat UI design without shadows or effects.
